image_analysis.description: A scanned document showing four pages of a legal transcript, arranged in a 2x2 grid. The pages are numbered 197, 199, 198, and 200. The text is a question-and-answer format typical of a deposition or hearing, with line numbers on the left margin of each page.
image_analysis.layout: Four pages are displayed on a single sheet. Top-left is page 197, top-right is 199, bottom-left is 198, and bottom-right is 200. A footer is present at the very bottom of the sheet.

1	BY MR. SCAROLA:
2	Q. -- that's a young woman.
3		MR. SCOTT: Objection. You're cutting the
4	witness off. You're not letting him finish.
5		A. This looks like a picture out of a Playboy

15	Exhibit 4.)

17	Q. Does Exhibit Number 4 help you at all to
18	recognize this young woman?
19		A. I've never -- I have no -- no recollection
20	of this young woman at all.

22	please, the Tatiana that you flew with Jeffrey
23	Epstein on November 17, 2005?

25	three years later than any of the issues involved in

4	no recollection of flying with her, but my

9	where he was meeting with academics and scholars, or

12		Q. But you never flew with her?
13		A. I have no recollection of flying with her.

document_metadata.subject: Questioning of a witness, Mr. Dershowitz, regarding his association with Tatiana Kovylina and Jeffrey Epstein, and flights taken in November 2005.

notes: The document is a transcript of a deposition or hearing. The speakers are identified as MR. SCAROLA (questioner), MR. SCOTT (likely another attorney), and THE WITNESS (identified as Mr. Dershowitz). The spelling of the name Tatiana is discussed, with variations T-A-I-N-N-A and T-A-T-I-N-I-N-A being mentioned.
